name: die higher.
description:
🚀 Your ship is broken, an asteroid is chasing you. How high can you go?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50

Theme: Delay the inevitable

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Keep in mind:

- WebGL build  is missing some assets/cinematics in order to work. I recommend downloading the game for a full experience;

- Game has been tested and developed for 1920x1080 resolution, scaling on other resolutions may not be accurate

🎮  A / D  to move

🎮  S  to land faster

❗ Tip:  Use the "land mechanic" (S)  more often to be faster and escape the asteroid

Using it will also make the game feel less slow-paced
